data.title: 45 Anne McCaffrey Trivia Quizzes

10 Qns

This is a quiz about "The Ship Who Searched" by Anne McCaffrey. Enjoy!

2.

Anne McCaffrey's "Tower and Hive" books

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

How well do you know the books about the FT&T Primes and their ongoing battle against the marauding 'Hivers'? This quiz covers the full story through all five books in the series.

20 Qns

5.

The Saga of the Talents

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

This is a Quiz on some of the books of the 'Saga of the Talents' by A. McCaffrey. It is mostly on 'Pegasus in Space' though. I hope you like it, please rate it so I know what you think.
